casebody.data:
Thorsten BLUMENSCHEIN
v.
Nicole BLUMENSCHEIN No. 357P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Jim Siemens, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Ana M. Prendergast, Attorney at Law, for Blumenschein, Thorsten. Emily S. Dezio, Attorney at Law, for Blumenschein, Nicole.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of October 2018 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
